January.theme: GOD’S BLESSINGS.
The more they were oppressed, the more they multiplied.
The midwives however feared God.
The girl went and called the baby’s mother.
REJOICE! THE LORD DELIVERS
Epiphany of the Lord. Surely the thing is known
I will be with you.
- I have promised to bring you up out of your misery.

January.season: Nat. Retreat for Chn Service Council/ BSPG National Conv.
January.theme: What is that in your hand?

January.season: Nat. Retreat for Chn Service Council/ BSPG National Conv.
January.theme: Go back to Egypt.

January.season: Nat. Retreat for Chn Service Council/ BSPG National Conv.
January.theme: Let my people go and celebrate a festival to me.
CHOSEN FOR THE MISSION OF THE FATHER
O LORD, why did you ever send me?
I am the LORD
It was this same Aaron and Moses to whom the LORD said.
See, I have made you like God to Pharaoh.
Take your staff and throw it down before Pharaoh.
By this you shall know that I am the LORD.
BEHOLD, THE SERVANT OF THE LORD
As soon as I leave you, I will pray to the LORD.
The magicians tried but they could not.
I will make a distinction between my people and your people. .

January.season: Mtg Ctte on Basic Educ./ BSPG Prayer & Fasting Week.
January.theme: Tomorrow the LORD will do this thing in the land.
It shall become fine dust all over the land.
This is why I have let you live.
SENT TO PREACH THE GOOD NEWS
Only in the land of Goshen, there was no hail.
The LORD is in the right.
How long will you refuse to humble yourself?
So he went out from Pharaoh and prayed.
Go, worship the LORD.

February.theme: Surely, God is good to His people.
THE GOSPEL, THE POWER OF GOD.
I have made the Sovereign LORD my refuge.
Remember the nation you purchased long ago.
Rise up, O God, and defend your cause.
It is God who judges.
It is you alone that is to be feared, O God.
When I was in distress, I sought the Lord.
Bible Sunday THE TRUE WAY OF LIFE.
Restore us, O God, make your face shine on us.
I am the LORD your God, who brought you out of Egypt.

February.season: Ctte on Tertiary Educ Mtg/YAF Evangelism Week
February.theme: O God, do not remain silent
Blessed are those who dwell in the house of God
I will listen to what the LORD says.
Give me a sign of your goodness for my enemies to see.
EOBEY GOD’S WORD AND LIVE.
But I will not take my love from him.
Lord, you have been our dwelling place.
He will cover you with His feathers.
He will call upon me and I will answer him.
It is good to praise the LORD.
The Lord reigns.
THE CHILD, EXHIBITING THE CHARACTER OF CHRIST.
Enter His gates with thanksgiving.
Hear my prayer, O LORD.
Lent begins. REPENT.
Let the hearts of those who seek the LORD rejoice.
Remember me, O LORD when you show favour.
For their sake, He remembered His covenant.

March.theme: OVERCOMING TEMPTATION.
Gather the left overs. Nothing should be wasted.
Be of good courage. It is I.
As many as touched it were made perfectly well.
For out of the heart comes evil thoughts.
Woman, you have great faith. Your request is granted.
The people were amazed when they saw the mute speaking.
STEPPING OUT IN FAITH.

March.theme: How many loaves do you have?

March.season: Youth & Std. Week GENERAL ASSEMBLY COUNCIL
March.theme: A wicked and adulterous generation seek after a sign.
GOD’S BLESSINGS.

March.season: Youth & Std. Week GENERAL ASSEMBLY COUNCIL
March.theme: Beware of the teachings of the Pharisees and Sadducees.
GOD’S BLESSINGS.
But who do you say I am?
Get behind me, Satan!
Whoever desires to save his life will lose it.

March.season: YOUTH & STUDENTS’ SUNDAY. 3rd Sunday in Lent.
March.theme: BECOMING MORE LIKE CHRIST.
This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.
O, faithless and perverse generation.
Take it and give to them for my tax and yours.
Unless you change and become like little children.
GOD’S BLESSINGS.
Woe to the man through whom they come
Do not look down on one of these little ones.
NOW I CAN SEE.
If your brother sins against you, go and tell him his fault.
Have patience with me, I will pay you. But he refused.
What God has joined together, let no one separate.
Let the little children come to me.
If you want to enter life, obey the commandments.
So the last will be first, and the first will be last
DRY BONES SHALL LIVE.
On the third day, He will be raised to life.
You don’t know what you are asking.

April.theme: Have mercy on us, O Lord.
Blessed is He who comes in the name of the Lord.
My house shall be called a house of prayer.
Neither will I tell you by what authority I do these things.
PALM SUNDAY THE VICTORIOUS CHRIST.
Which of the two did the will of his father?
The stone which the builders rejected has become the chief cornerstone.
Friend, how did you come in here?
Render therefore to Caesar the things that are Caesar’s.
DYING WITH THE LORD.
You shall love the Lord your God with your all.
CHRIST IS RISEN INDEED!
Lord, Open Our Eyes to See You.
David calls him ‘Lord.’
Do not do what they do, for they do not practice what they teach.
Woe to you scribes and Pharisees.
You were not willing.
Woe to those who are pregnant in those days.
PEACE BE WITH YOU.
The sign of the Son of Man will appear in heaven.
Watch therefore.
There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.

April.season: YAF Week /Nat. Chn Serv. Teachers’ Conf.
April.theme: Behold, the bridegroom is coming.

April.season: YAF Week /Nat. Chn Serv. Teachers’ Conf.
April.theme: To everyone who has, more will be given.
When the Son of Man comes.
LET CHRIST BE FORMED IN YOU: YAF AS AN AGENT OF TRANSFORMATION.
They plotted to kill Jesus.
Why this waste.
What are you willing to give me if I deliver him to you?
He will betray me.
Yes it is you.

May.theme: Take eat, this is my Body.
I will strike the Shepherd and the sheep, scattered.
CHRIST THE GOOD SHEPHERD.
My Father, if it is possible, let this cup pass from me.
Put your sword in its place.
But Jesus remained silent.
Before the rooster crows, you will deny me three times.
I have sinned, he said..
I am innocent of the blood of this person.
WOMAN, LET CHRIST REFLECT IN YOUR LIFE – ANNA THE DEVOTED WOMAN.
They stripped him and put a scarlet robe on him.
He trusts in God.
Darkness came over the land.
At that moment, the curtain of the temple was torn.
And Mary Magdalene was there.
They went and made the tomb secure.

May.theme: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given me.
He will keep you strong to the end.
THAT THEY MAY ALL BE ONE.
Is Christ divided?
The foolishness of God is wiser than man’s wisdom.
That your faith might not rest on men’s wisdom.
Lord, grant me your spirit to understand your mind.
The Spirit searches all things, even the deep things of God.
But we have the mind of Christ.
TURNING THE WORLD UPSIDE DOWN WITH A TRANSFORMED LIFESTYLE.

June.theme: There is jealousy and quarrelling among you.
Those who have been given a trust must prove faithful.
What do you have that you did not receive?
Therefore I urge you to imitate me.
